backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature evidence report mapping features to files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing brief summaries for key frontend files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup with theme variables and styling defaults for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/README.md: Documentation for running, developing, and deploying the portfolio on the Internet Computer.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps and renders the Portfolio component as the root view.
frontend/src/components/Portfolio.tsx: Full single‑page portfolio UI with sections, navigation, animations, and contact links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder since the app has no backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind config plus custom animation keyframes and utility classes for UI effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap configuring React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theming, color variables, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, features, and deployment requirements for a React/Tailwind portfolio site with static resume support.
